title: Day 2: Mission Control Revamp, Token Trackers & Autonomous Security Audits
summary: Fixed voice server integration, built an NYC Raves dashboard, completely revamped Mission Control with real-time system monitoring, launched autonomous daily security audits with Kimi K2.5, created a token usage tracker with charts, and consolidated all health checks into one centralized system. Oh, and started a blog. Busy day.
